title: How Many Calories in Boba Tea?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in boba tea for a standard 16 oz serving, plus carbs, sugars, fat, protein, and tweaks for lighter options.
h1: How Many Calories in Boba Tea?
assumptions: 16 oz milk-based boba tea with black tapioca pearls, moderate sweetness, dairy milk; no extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by tea type, milk (dairy/plant-based), sweetness level, boba quantity, and brand. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical 16 oz boba tea serving contains about 400 kcal, mostly from sugars and tapioca.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in boba tea without pearls?
faqs.a: About 300 kcal for a 16 oz serving, as boba adds ~100 kcal from carbs.

faqs.q: Is boba tea high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 60 g sugars per 16 oz serving from syrup and milk.

faqs.q: How many calories in green tea boba?
faqs.a: Similar to black tea boba at ~400 kcal, but varies by base and add-ins.

faqs.q: What's the protein in boba tea?
faqs.a: Around 5 g per serving, mainly from milk; low overall.
